articles.title: Sticker shock: Galaxy Ring price leak hints at expensive debut - Android Authority
articles.description: Leaked pricing information suggests that the Samsung Galaxy Ring could be priced higher than expected, potentially around $350-$400 in the US.
articles.content:
• A new report claims that the European price of the Samsung Galaxy Ring will be 449.
  • This could translate to a US price of about $350-$400, higher than the initially expected $300.
